relationships.description: Neville and Hermione used to sneak out at night and put graffiti on the walls together.
The Carrow family was driven mad by the secret communication between Harry and his friends, who were part of Dumbledore's Army.
Snape hated the graffiti on the walls.
Neville also lost Ginny after Easter.
Michael Corner got caught releasing a first-year student they'd chained up.
Neville and Ron shared past experiences of fighting against the Carrows.
